mapper.insert: insert into admin_user (user_id, username, `password`, salt, realname, avatar, phone, email, sex, locked, ctime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update admin_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, username, `password`, salt, realname, avatar, phone, email, sex, locked, ctime from admin_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, username, `password`, salt, realname, avatar, phone, email, sex, locked, ctime from admin_user
